description: Kaphar draws on his own painful relationship with his father in his film, Exhibiting Forgiveness. He says the project gave him "a sympathy for my father that I never had as a young man."
title: For painter Titus Kaphar, forgiveness is 'a weight lifted off of your shoulders'

description: In Anora, Mikey Madison plays a sex worker who dances at a strip club and meets — and marries — the son of a Russian oligarch. Filmmaker Sean Baker seems to anticipate and avoid conventions about on-screen violence.
title: The real nightmare in Sean Baker’s 'Anora' isn’t what you expect
